author: Taegan Goddard
title: Flashback Quote of the Day
text:
Flashback Quote of the Day October 19, 2015 By Taegan Goddard 0 Comments 
“I really am convinced we’re in danger of the sort of terrorist attacks that will make the bombing of the Trade Center look like kids playing with firecrackers. No sensible analyst rejects this possibility, and plenty of them, like me, are not wondering if but when it will happen. 
— Donald Trump, in his 2000 book, The America We Deserve , via BuzzFeed . Related Posts Never miss a Political Wire post Your email address: * Please enter all required fields Correct invalid entries
